DOC.brief_summary: A prospective observational multi centre research study in GP practices clustered within up to 10 UK Primary care trusts.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Impact of Indacaterol (OnbrezÂ®) on the Individual Lives and Health Status of Patients With COPD
DOC.criteria: Patients with active diagnosis of COPD, confirmed by spirometry documented in medical notes Patients who are currently receiving other maintenance therapy (except LAMA) for COPD. Patients previously prescribed Indacaterol.
